meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Emily Gadek Priscilla Emery Sarah McNitt Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6757.

td.p: Emily Gadek, a web and social media editor from Palm Springs, California
Priscilla Emery, a records management consultant from Longwood, Florida
Sarah McNitt, a study-abroad advisor originally from Ann Arbor, Michigan (whose 5-day cash winnings total $89,398)

tr.td: ENTERTAINMENT BY THE NUMBERS
RETAIL THERAPY
"C" THE WORLD
OBAMA-RAMA
RHYME LINE
(Alex: All correct responses will rhyme with the word "line".)
& THE FISH WAS THIS BIG!
